Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.impl

Class BudgetServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.impl.BudgetServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
BudgetService
@Service public class BudgetServiceImpl extends Object implements BudgetService
Implementation of the BudgetService interface. This service manages the operations related to budgets, including saving, retrieving, and updating budget information.

      Specified by:
      updateBudget in interface BudgetService
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Throws:
